participant_1.background:
I wake up early and enjoy a cup of coffee with my boyfriend before we head to work.
i read fantasy fiction novels.
i am 25 years old and live with my parents.
I frequently drink chocolate milk, which is not very good for my weight.
i wonder about what life in space would be like.

participant_2.background:
I love how my skunk purse always makes people laugh.
i like to use a lot of exclamation marks when i type.
I get along with my family well.
i like toyota cars.
i love lasagna like i m garfield.

content.text: Great! Thanks for asking! How are you doing today?
That's great to hear! I read fantasy fiction novels too!
Really? That's awesome! What's your favorite series?
I have a few but I'd have to say The Stormlight Archive is my favorite.
Oh wow, I've heard good things about that series but I haven't read it yet!
You should! It's really good. I love the world building and the characters.
I'll have to check it out then! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to share my love of books with others.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to hang out with my family, go to concerts, and read. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do a lot of those things too.
Awesome! We should totally hang out sometime!
Cool! I'll send you a message and we can figure out a time.
